constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: A4D Storage and distribution to residential

decision_conditions: <p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">A soil sampling and analyses exercise shall be completed in any garden, area of landscaping and/or yard area. The results, assessment and recommendations shall be agreed with the Local Planning Authority before the recommendations are implemented.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p><p><br></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">No occupation of the development shall take place until the agreed recommendations have been fully implemented and evidence of their implementation has been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></p><p><br></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">The sampling and analyses exercise and implementation of recommendations will be completed in line with the Council's guidance for 'Small scale investigation works in garden, landscaped and yard areas'. &nbsp; Any significant evidence of contamination encountered during the course of the development shall be notified to the Planning Authority and Contaminated Land Officer within 5 working day.&nbsp; All development shall cease in the affected area.&nbsp; Any additional or unforeseen contamination shall be dealt with as agreed with the Contaminated Land Officer.&nbsp; Where development has ceased in the affected area, it shall recommence upon written notification of the Planning Authority</span></p><p><br></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: In the interests of prevention of pollution of the environment and safeguarding human health.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Prior to the the first occupation of the residential unit, hereby approved, provision of facilities for the disposal of litter and refuse shall be made available in accordance with the drawings submitted and retained thereafter.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-2845eee9-7fff-c3e7-9e8f-dfb84d1720a7"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: To ensure that adequate refuse facilities are available from residents of the proposed development. </span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning General Development Order 2015 (or any Order revoking and re-enacting that Order), planning permission shall be required in respect of any proposed extension to the building that would fall within Class(es) A - E of Part 1 to the second schedule to that Order.</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-8f7e49b2-7fff-d53c-bf7f-86238fb75509"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Reason: The addition of extensions to the building has the potential to be harmful to the appearance of this group of buildings and to the amenity of neighbouring occupiers, and so the Council wishes to control the addition of extensions.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">The development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-cfbfe334-7fff-1181-1dc9-d46c3c5bf711"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">All dwellings within the development hereby approved shall be completed in compliance with Building Regulations Optional Requirement Part M4 (2) 'accessible and adaptable dwellings' (or any subsequent replacement) prior to first occupation and shall be retained as such thereafter.</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-06929668-7fff-f1eb-60f8-7fa2a24cc48f"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON:&nbsp; To ensure that the development is adequately accessible for future occupiers.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">All space and hot water fossil fuel (or equivalent hydrocarbon based fuel) boilers must achieve dry NOx emission levels equivalent to or less than 40 mg/kWh.&nbsp;</span></p><p><br></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Reason: To protect air quality and people's health by ensuring that the production of air pollutants, such as nitrogen dioxide and particulate matter, are kept to a minimum during the course of building works and during the lifetime of the development. To contribute towards the maintenance or to prevent further exceedences of National Air Quality Objectives.</span></p><p><br></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">No soil stacks, soil vent pipes, flues, ductwork or any other pipework shall be fixed to the street elevations of the building other than as shown on the drawings hereby approved.</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-e63b60ec-7fff-7faa-fe35-bea819a5a5ba"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and does not detract from the character and visual amenity of the area.</span></p>
description: Variation of condition 2 (approved plans) pursuant to planning permission 2017/2088 dated 19/07/2017. The effect of the variation will be to: amend the boundary line of the property; reduce the footprint of the ground floor; change colour of brick from buff to red; amendments to the windows on the front elevation; the inclusion of porthole windows on the rear elevation; changes to landscaping; the relocation of the cycle storage; and changes to the external lighting on-site.
